com.facebook.buck.cxx.toolchain

Class CxxBuckConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cxx.toolchain.CxxBuckConfig

  • public class CxxBuckConfig
extends Object
    Contains platform independent settings for C/C++ rules.

        public boolean isIndependentSharedLibraryInterfaces()
        Returns:
